steps.name: Best Buy API is up and running
I hit url with query parameter as "all"
API returns response with status code as 200
all the products will be returned

elements.name: Get all products, sort by highest price (descending)

steps.name: Best Buy API is up and running
I hit url with query parameter as "$sort[price]=-1"
API returns response with status code as 200

output: Price is returned in sorted in descending order
steps.name: products prices will be returned in descending order

steps.name: Best Buy API is up and running
I hit url with query parameter as "price[$lte]=1"
API returns response with status code as 200

output: Prices of the products are less than equal to $1.00
steps.name: products with price less than or equal to "$1.00" will be displayed

name: Best Buy API Product Info
